body_html:
Oh! Turns out, using integers totally fixes it. My initial use case before I ended up reducing down to the test case I posted used booleans for the on/off values. That also doesn't work, but that's totally fine, since I can get the same behavior with integers and casts.
Great, thanks so much!

body:
Oh! Turns out, using integers totally fixes it. My initial use case before I ended up reducing down to the test case I posted used booleans for the on/off values. That also doesn't work, but that's totally fine, since I can get the same behavior with integers and casts.
Great, thanks so much!
